00044 bool sig_chld_nocldwait()
00045 {
00046     struct sigaction sa;
00047     sigemptyset( & sa.sa_mask );
00048     sa.sa_flags= SA_NOCLDWAIT;
00049     sa.sa_handler = SIG_DFL;
00050     if( sigaction( SIGCHLD, & sa, NULL ) )
00051             return false;
00052     return true;
00053 }

00089 bool sig_catch( int s, void (*f)(int) )
00090 {
00091     struct sigaction sa;
00092     sa.sa_handler = f;
00093     sa.sa_flags = 0;
00094     sigemptyset(&sa.sa_mask);
00095     return ! sigaction(s,&sa,(struct sigaction *) 0) ? true : false;
00096 }
